animation.condition: [Window.IsActive(pictures) | Window.IsActive(450)] + [substring(listitem.filenameandpath,jpg) | substring(listitem.filenameandpath,bmp) | substring(listitem.filenameandpath,png) | substring(listitem.filenameandpath,tif) | substring(listitem.filenameandpath,ico) | substring(listitem.filenameandpath,pcx) | substring(listitem.filenameandpath,tga)]] + !Window.Next(Home)

control.visible: Controlgroup(7001).HasFocus | Controlgroup(7000).HasFocus | Window.IsActive(yesnodialog) | Window.IsActive(contextmenu) | Window.IsActive(contentsettings) | Window.IsActive(favourites) | Window.IsActive(mediasource) | Window.IsActive(addonsettings) | Window.IsActive(okdialog) | Window.IsActive(pictureinfo) | Window.IsActive(songinformation)
